name: Retro Sphere
description: Feeling of speed, love for a dizzying drive and devotion to retro is about you? Then, welcome to RETRO SPHERE! RETRO SPHERE is a game in the genre Runner, made in an attractive style of neon colors and contrasting colors for dynamic and mesmerizing music.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTFORCE 560 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: PCI-E Asus Xonar DSX Retail DSX/ASM
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 2 GB available space
